short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a unique computer identifier and the local computer name to the Elegant Access Records Management System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elegant Access is a web-based Electronic Medical Records Management System that permits mental health providers to record information about their patients and clients. This extension provides a unique computer identifier, the local computer name, and the Facility ID to the Elegant Access Records Management System to help prevent unauthorized access to patient records, as well as for auditing purposes.
